scenario_text.value:
Hey Takuma, doesn’t this place seem a huge
lot messier than before?

Yeah, now that you mention it. There’s stuff
scattered all over the place.

That’s just because of me. I like to make
a big mess.

(She won’t make eye contact, and she seems
really flustered. That’s pretty suspicious.)
Now I want to be alone, so get out of here!

There’s nobody else here, just me! So I’m the
one who made the mess!
